Html:
Special needs people  is a term used to describe individuals who require assistance for disabilities , they are presents an ignored sector of the community  specially the Quadriplegia Patients , and since they are a human beings and they've the right to be a part of our community and out of that responsibility we deiced as - Team Imaginst - to enlighten the down of our project [ I Can, U Can ]I Can,U Can is a open source Software based on open source touch-less SDK were made to help special needs Patients by making  the world a better place, helping them to use the computer with it full functions and interact and communicate with the social environment around them by just moving there heads to use the mouse , to improve there ability's and spread there visions,thoughts and believes.

http://www.facebook.com/video/video.php?v=10150238720933465

thank you All........
